about_the_game:
Zombiemachia – The Art of Brutal Survival

Zombiemachia is an independent first-person horror game where you face endless waves of zombies. No storyline, just pure carnage. With realistic graphics and immersive gameplay, this mature game offers an intense and uncompromising experience.

Kill zombies and earn dollars

Every zombie you kill earns you money, but dismembering them boosts your earnings! Gathering dollars smartly is essential to progressing quickly and surviving the relentless waves of zombies.

Weapons and ammunition

Use your hard-earned dollars to buy ammo or unlock even more devastating weapons. Make the right choices to maximize your chances of survival.

Activate deadly traps

Temporarily activate strategically placed traps to decimate the zombies. These traps allow you to control the battlefield and eliminate multiple assailants at once, adding a new layer of strategy to each encounter.
